fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Borders and Security
head_office_address: Calle Cerezos, 545 B. Urb. El Clavín.
eu_initiatives:
Legal and constitutional affairs; Budgetary control; Regional development, transport and tourism; Employment and social affairs; Agriculture and fisheries; Development and international trade; Justice and home affairs; Foreign affairs, security and defense. 
For more information: http://www.blomeyer.eu/policy-areas/
goals__remit: Our vision is to contribute to affirming European values, becoming a trusted advisor to law and policy makers. Our mission is to assert European values by serving law and policy makers. Our research and evaluation services draw on our team’s independence and integrity, build on academic rigour and offer pragmatic solutions.
relevant_communication:
